name: Instacrime
description:
Have you always dreamed of being an investigator?

It's time to play! The game is on !

Emma Crohn was murdered, you only have your Instacrim account at your disposal to solve the murder.

So which of Rebecca, Katlyn, Jean-Max, Maelle or Emil killed the victim? how and why ?

It's up to you to find out in our new game: Instacrim!

Thanks to the team:
Tibseydon: team management
Merliin: developer
Bandithony : developer
Lucieinthesky: graphic designer
